definition.procedurexml: <xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block type="event_trigger" deletable="false" x="41" y="35"><field name="trigger">Player respawns</field><next><block type="entity_set_gamemode"><field name="gamemode">SURVIVAL</field><next><block type="entity_nbt_logic_set"><value name="tagName"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">forceGhost</field></block></value><value name="tagValue"><block type="logic_boolean"><field name="BOOL">FALSE</field></block></value><next><block type="entity_nbt_logic_set"><value name="tagName"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">forceProject</field></block></value><value name="tagValue"><block type="logic_boolean"><field name="BOOL">FALSE</field></block></value><next><block type="entity_disable_damage"><value name="condition"><block type="logic_boolean"><field name="BOOL">FALSE</field></block></value><next><block type="variables_set_number"><field name="VAR">global:ForceConnectionInDeath</field><value name="VAL"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">4</field></block></value><next><block type="entity_allow_flying"><value name="condition"><block type="logic_boolean"><field name="BOOL">FALSE</field></block></value><next><block type="controls_if"><value name="IF0"><block type="entity_has_achievement"><field name="achievement">CUSTOM:CheatingDeath</field></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="entity_open_gui"><field name="guiname">RespawnGui</field></block></statement></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></xml>
